title: Riot Make This
body: What is the biggest problem about ur client? not the visions problem, not all the bugs, but using the restroom or getting something to drink while in que and people who have ur LoL mobile app well get an alert when a que happens.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Y'know, this might be a decent idea. I wanna go ahead and say: if you're going to hop in a queue, at least try to take care of IRL business like restrooms and eating out of the way before jumping in. That way you're ready to go when the queue does pop.

With that being said, I'd suggest you go ahead and post this idea over in Client Discussion to make sure it gets a little more visibility. H&S isn't quite the best place for suggestions like this, but I'm always happy to take a look ^_^!
